trans-unit.target: Please select a valid certificate file

trans-unit.target: Password is required if the certificate format is '.pfx'

trans-unit.target: Account name has a maximum length of 64 characters

trans-unit.target: Account name has a minimum length of 3 characters

trans-unit.source: Account name can only contain lower case letters and numbers
trans-unit.target: Account name can only contain lower case letters and numbers

trans-unit.source: Account name is a required field
trans-unit.target: Il nome account è un campo obbligatorio

trans-unit.source: You've already reached your quota {used} out of {quota} accounts for subscription '{subscription}' in this location. You can request a an account quota increase, create the account in another location, or create the account in another subscription.
trans-unit.target: You've already reached your quota {used} out of {quota} accounts for subscription '{subscription}' in this location. You can request a an account quota increase, create the account in another location, or create the account in another subscription.

trans-unit.target: No resources groups available in subscription '{subscription}'

trans-unit.target: You don't have permission to create a batch account under this resource group

trans-unit.source: Resource group is a required field
trans-unit.target: Resource group is a required field

trans-unit.source: This resource group doesn't exist yet, and it will be created before batch account.
trans-unit.target: Questo gruppo di risorse non esiste ancora e verrà creato prima dell'account batch.

trans-unit.target: Please specify subscription and location before picking a storage account.

trans-unit.target: Non è possibile fare riferimento allo stesso certificato due volte {thumbprint}

trans-unit.target: No certificate(s) found for this batch account, please upload your certificate(s) first.
